product.title: None Listed Rotating Curling Iron - 3 in1 Automatic Curling Iron with Interchangeable CurlingWand, 3/4, 1 1/4, 1 Inch CurlingIron for Lasting Beach Waves, Adjustable Temp, Instant Heat, Dual Voltage (Black)
product.title_excluding_brand: Rotating Curling Iron - 3 in1 Automatic Curling Iron with Interchangeable CurlingWand, 3/4, 1 1/4, 1 Inch CurlingIron for Lasting Beach Waves, Adjustable Temp, Instant Heat, Dual Voltage (Black)
product.description: Exclusive Structural Design Rotating Curling Iron: Our 3 in1 auto curling irons with Negative ions is simpler and handier than old-style wand curlers. Hit a button and get longer-lasting curls fast. Automatic curling iron rotating tech makes styling effortless, save your time. Multi-use Automatic Curling Iron: This automatic rotating curling iron with 3 Interchangeable Curling Wand (0.75", 1", 1.25"). 0.75 Inch Barrel: Create defined waves; rotating curling iron 1 Inch Barrel: Create daily waves; 1.25 Inch Barrel: Creates nice beach waves. Exact Heat Control: Our automatic hair curler has 5 heat settings, from 300°F to 450°F, and heats up super fast in only 30s. The LCD screen clearly shows the temperature and speed, so you can set it just right for your hair type. Whether your hair is thick or thin, short medium or long, this hair curling waves iron works great and won`t damaging your hair. Curling Iron Automatic Rotation: Using the auto-rotation feature by pressing the L or R button, effortlessly achieve long-lasting culrs with self rotating curling irons. The carefully designed clips offer a firm grip while still being easy to use. Home button (Reset) -Long press to reset the clamp. Anti-Scald Design: Our curling iron automatic puts safety first with features like a cool tip and a safety stand. The Reset button makes it easy to let go of your hair and reset the clamp, and it will auto shut off after an hour, just in case you forget. This curling iron automatic hair curler kit includes a glove and a storage bag to help you style safe and easily. Dual Voltage Curling Iron rotating: hair rotating curling iron offers universal dual voltage, great for travel. Great for wife, girlfriends, mothers, or daughters

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
